List of webHosts that support nginX and Clustered hosting of your webapps¶

The following WebHost support nginX in Shared/VPS/Cloud/Dedicated hosting and provide support for hosting your website in native nginX+php-fpm including assistance in converting your htaccess rewrite rules.

TUNEDHOSTING.COM

CONEXCOL CLOUD

WE PUSH BUTTONS

ALPHANEXT
